column187: named entities\";\"\";\"\";\"German\";\"This historical corpus contains sermons from 1650 to 1750. For linguistic annotation
column188: each individual token was automatically assigned to a morphosyntactic word class using the TreeTagger software. As a classification system
column189: the 54-part Stuttgart-Tübingen TagSet (STTS) was used. For lemmatization
column190: a normalized basic word form was used for each token and the Duden and the German dictionary by Jacob and Wilhelm Grimm were used as reference works. The part-of-speech tagging and lemmatization was then manually checked.#SEPThe corpus is available through a dedicated concordancer.\";\"Manually annotated corpora\";\"Concordancer\";\"https://acdh.oeaw.ac.at/abacus/corpus.html\";\"Resch et al (2016)\";\"https://www.clarin.eu/resource-families/manually-annotated-corpora#Resch%20et%20al.%202016\";\"\""
